results.content: Too many sections on just loading Font Awesome. This could have been done in one video.

response.content:
Shawn thank you for your feedback.
Please keep in mind that you just watched the first 2% of the course, which just gets everybody started with the topic. We'll directly dive into writing code on how to use Font Awesome after this introduction.
You can of course always skip lectures

The reason why loading Font Awesome was not done in one video is because there are 2 ways of loading Font Awesome. 

Method 1. Using SVG with JavaScript.
Method 2. Legacy Method of Using Web Fonts With CSS.

The 1st method is RECOMMENDED whiles the 2nd method is OPTIONAL since it's a legacy method. I did not want to put all loading methods in one video since it will make the video too long or boring. 
Separating both loading methods into different sections was intended to make the course complete and comprehensive without leaving out other topics. 
To be honest I think giving a 1 star rating because I separated how to load Font Awesome in different sections seems too harsh.
response.content_html:
Shawn thank you for your feedback.
Please keep in mind that you just watched the first 2% of the course, which just gets everybody started with the topic. We'll directly dive into writing code on how to use Font Awesome after this introduction.
You can of course always skip lectures

The reason why loading Font Awesome was not done in one video is because there are 2 ways of loading Font Awesome.

Method 1. Using SVG with JavaScript.
Method 2. Legacy Method of Using Web Fonts With CSS.

The 1st method is RECOMMENDED whiles the 2nd method is OPTIONAL since it's a legacy method. I did not want to put all loading methods in one video since it will make the video too long or boring.
Separating both loading methods into different sections was intended to make the course complete and comprehensive without leaving out other topics.
To be honest I think giving a 1 star rating because I separated how to load Font Awesome in different sections seems too harsh.
